original_title: Tea Leaf Green: Rock 'N' Roll Band
overview: Join Ben Chambers, Trevor Garrod and the rest of the Tea Leaf Green jam band in this Justin Kreutzmann-directed documentary that incorporates a generous sprinkling of concert footage. Witness the group's unforgettable performance at Boulder, Colorado's Fox Theater, where they shared their San Francisco-grown sound, as well as more intimate moments where band members talk about what it's like to be on the way up the mountain of fame.
title: Tea Leaf Green: Rock 'N' Roll Band
